msg: (load_configs): Consolidate some comments for clarity, following up

author: cmpilato
msg: Restore some simple special case logic in 'svn log' generation that
got bypassed when at some point we started passing "/" instead of ""
for requests of root directory logs.
(svn_repos_get_logs4): Check for a single-path case of "/" as well as ""
in the quicky log generation special case.

author: danielsh
msg: In svnserve, tolerate unreadable passwd files.
(load_configs):  Skip reading the passwd file if it is unreadable (EACCES),
logging the error but allowing other authentications (such as --tunnel)
